desc: Programming, playing games, managing relationships; everything can be turned into a problem and solved :)
I love creating solutions, iterating, and improving.
Do something and reflect on it. Always consider what can be done differently!
Discuss, brainstorm, debate. I want my ideas to be challenged so they can be improved on.
I maintain strong relationships with those I work with, whether they are teammates, managers, or clients.
I organize resources and people so that everyone can work at their best.
